fixes.name: Delta Down T EUR Fix
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T EUR] + 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Fix Value T]
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated a row-level addition of two fields to a calculated column. No aggregations or parameters are present, so this is implemented as a calculated column with fully qualified table column references.
